titles.title: A resolution relative to the death of Jacob Chic Hecht, former United States Senator for the State of Nevada.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
5/16/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that the Senate has heard with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the death of the Honorable Jacob Chic Hecht, a former member of the United States Senate.
Declares that when the Senate adjourns on May 16, 2006, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Senator Hecht.
